problem: 如图,两个同心圆的半径分别为3cm和5cm,弦AB与小圆相切于点C,则AB的长为()
answer: 解:连接OC和OB,∵弦AB与小圆相切,∴OC⊥AB,在Rt△OBC中,BC=√{OB²-OC²}=√{5²-3²}=4,∴AB=2BC=8cm．故选:D．
comment: 本题主要考查切线的性质和垂径定理的应用．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, the radii of the two concentric circles are N_0 and N_1 respectively, and the chord AB is tangent to the small circle at point C, then the length of AB is ()
